descriptionHtml:
MHSN_Weapons in skyrim Author NPR
--------------------------------------------------------------
I am not good at English. So enough support is not possible, please understand it

The original is from a Monster Hunter Series. 
Model and textures were made entirely by me.
---------------------------------------------------------------
Adds craftable Monster Hunter Weapons to Skyrim.
A blacksmith\'s method should look at ScreenShot, 
---------------------------------------------------------------
v2
Great Sword is added to a name. 
It is a little dark in Barbaroi Blade texture. 
The rusty large ore is added. 
It is processible from the rusty large ore to Monolith Great Sword or Ancient Great Sword. 
---------------------------------------------------------------
v2.1
It corrected that the added weapon could not be created. 

---------------------------------------------------------------
Please use this MOD freely. 
---------------------------------------------------------------
